title: Chopped 'n' Skrewed
text:
"Chopped 'n' Skrewed" is the second single released from R&B singer-songwriter <a href="T-Pain">T-Pain</a>'s third album, "<a href="Thr33%20Ringz">Thr33 Ringz</a>". The song features American rapper <a href="Ludacris">Ludacris</a>. It was first released on the Canadian <a href="iTunes">iTunes</a> on September 22, 2008, the same day the song was also added to T-Pain's <a href="MySpace">MySpace</a>. It was released in the US on iTunes on September 30.
Background.
The song has a futuristic beat and creates different scenarios about men being misled and blown off by women. The title and style of the song refers to the <a href="chopped%20and%20screwed">chopped and screwed</a> genre of music created in <a href="Texas">Texas</a>. It also features the <a href="autotune">autotune</a> feature to produce its static and powerful beat
T-Pain performed the song on <a href="Saturday%20Night%20Live">Saturday Night Live</a> on November 22, 2008 with Ludacris, along with "<a href="One%20More%20Drink">One More Drink</a>". At the 2008 <a href="Black%20Entertainment%20Television">BET</a> Hip-Hop Awards, T-Pain and Ludacris performed the song along with <a href="Lil%20Wayne">Lil Wayne</a>. The instrumental of the song was used in a <a href="commercial%20bumper">commercial bumper</a> on <a href="Adult%20Swim">Adult Swim</a>, which T-Pain is associated with.
Music video.
The video, which features elements from "<a href="Can%27t%20Believe%20It%20%28T-Pain%20song%29">Can't Believe It</a>", was expected to be released on October 14, along with the single release of the album's third single "Freeze," according to the iTunes Store countdown to "Thr33 Ringz". However it was released on October 12 and can be viewed on <a href="https%3A//www.youtube.com/user/TPainVideos">T-Pain's YouTube account</a>. The video features a cameo from <a href="DJ%20Khaled">DJ Khaled</a> and <a href="Sophia%20Fresh">Sophia Fresh</a>.
Remixes.
The song was <a href="Mashup%20%28music%29">mashed up</a> with <a href="The%20Pains%20of%20Being%20Pure%20At%20Heart">The Pains of Being Pure At Heart</a> by <a href="The%20Hood%20Internet">The Hood Internet</a>. A remix of the song which featured <a href="R.%20Kelly">R. Kelly</a> was leaked on the Internet. There is also a remix by <a href="Screwed%20Up%20Click">S.U.C</a>. It is featured on <a href="Swishahouse">Swishahouse</a> mixtape "Final Chapter 8".
Chart positions.
Year-end charts.
In the U.S., "Chopped 'n' Skrewed" was certified Gold by the <a href="RIAA">RIAA</a>, signifying sales of over 500,000 singles.
